name: Gmail Compose
description:
Version 0.1
These styles override some of the new styles in the latest Gmail UI update making the buttons and other UI elements cleaner and less bulky.
additional_info:
Overrides applied

06/26/2018
- Added a noticeable yet faint background color to ads injected by google.

06/05/2018
- Updated the "track package / view order" action associated with delivery emails 

05/18/2018
The "Received 3 days ago. Reply?" label wasn't ADA compliant.
- Added a white background
- Made the font color darker
- changed the font weight to bold

05/10/2018
- changed the font weight and color in the notification header (spam & trash boxes)

05/02/2018
- Squared off label indicators
- Added background color to the message row toolbar

05/01/2018
- aligned multi-select checkbox
- aligned multi-select status bar
- darker attachment indicator background

04/23/2018
- Unread Messages font weight
- Compose button squared off and realigned. No more ugly pill shaped button!
- Search Bar extends across the top
- Check Box borders are thinner
- Active Label Indicator is squared off. No more rounded corners
- Attachment border is squared off.
